# Drumset

# Drumset ⇐ Instrument

Can play drum sounds, has clap, hihat-closed, hihat-open, kick, snare, tom-high, tom-low, tom-mid.

Kind: global class
Extends: Instrument

  • Drumset ⇐ Instrument
    • .name
    • .init()
    • .generatePath()
    • .getPlayer(fileName) ⇒ Tone.Player
    • .play(fileName)

Kind: instance property of Drumset

Kind: instance method of Drumset

Kind: instance method of Drumset

# drumset.getPlayer(fileName) ⇒ Tone.Player

Get a note's Player.

Kind: instance method of Drumset

Param
fileName

# drumset.play(fileName)

Plays audio by name.

Kind: instance method of Drumset

Param Type
fileName string
